message_no_active_tab.description: Error message when no active tab is found

message_video_removed.description: Success message when a video is removed from history

message_error_removing_video.description: Error message when removing a video fails, $1 is the error detail

message_history_cleared.description: Success message when history is cleared

message_error_clearing_history.description: Error message when clearing history fails, $1 is the error detail

message_export_success.message: Историята е експортирана успешно: $1 видеа, $2 плейлисти
message_export_success.description: Success message when history is exported, $1 is video count, $2 is playlist count

message_error_exporting_history.description: Error message when exporting history fails, $1 is the error detail

message_import_success.description: Success message when history is imported, $1 is mode, $2 is video count, $3 is playlist count

message_error_importing_history.description: Error message when importing history fails, $1 is the error detail

message_no_data_in_import.message: Не са намерени данни във файла за импортиране
message_no_data_in_import.description: Error message when no data is found in import file

message_invalid_file_format.description: Error message for invalid import file format, $1 is the detail

message_confirm_clear_history.message: Сигурни ли сте, че искате да изчистите цялата история? Това не може да бъде отменено.
message_confirm_clear_history.description: Confirmation message for clearing all history

message_confirm_full_sync.message: Пълната синхронизация ще изчисти старите данни и ще синхронизира всичко наново. Това може да отнеме известно време. Продължавате ли?

message_warning_clear_all.message:
ВНИМАНИЕ: Това ще изтрие ЗАВИНАГИ цялата ви история на гледане и плейлисти в YouTube.

Това действие не може да бъде отменено. Сигурни ли сте, че искате да продължите?
message_warning_clear_all.description: Warning message for clearing all history and playlists

message_all_history_cleared.message: Цялата история на видеа и плейлисти е изчистена успешно
message_all_history_cleared.description: Success message when all history and playlists are cleared

message_export_completed.description: Success message when export is completed

message_failed_to_initialize.description: Error message when extension initialization fails, $1 is the error detail

message_error_loading_history.description: Error message when loading history fails, $1 is the error detail

message_no_playlists_found.description: Message when no playlists are found

message_error_loading_playlists.description: Error message when loading playlists fails, $1 is the error detail

message_playlist_removed.description: Success message when a playlist is removed

message_error_removing_playlist.description: Error message when removing a playlist fails, $1 is the error detail

message_auto_clean_updated.message: Периодът за автоматично почистване е обновен
message_auto_clean_updated.description: Success message when auto-clean period is updated

message_pagination_count_updated.description: Message when pagination count is updated

message_overlay_title_updated.description: Message when overlay title is updated

message_overlay_color_updated.description: Message when overlay color is updated

message_overlay_size_updated.description: Message when overlay label size is updated

message_theme_preference_updated.description: Message when theme preference is updated

message_debug_mode_enabled.message: Режимът за отстраняване на грешки е активиран
message_debug_mode_enabled.description: Message when debug mode is enabled

message_debug_mode_disabled.message: Режимът за отстраняване на грешки е деактивиран
message_debug_mode_disabled.description: Message when debug mode is disabled

message_sync_disabled.message: Синхронизацията е изключена - Кликнете, за да я активирате

message_sync_not_available.message: Синхронизацията не е налична - Изисква се Firefox Sync

message_sync_error.message: Грешка при синхронизация - Кликнете за повторен опит

message_sync_na.description: Label for sync not available status

message_just_now.description: Label for just now sync time

message_minutes_ago.description: Label for minutes ago sync time

message_hours_ago.description: Label for hours ago sync time

message_days_ago.description: Label for days ago sync time

message_firefox_sync_not_available.message: Firefox Sync не е наличен. Моля, активирайте Firefox Sync в настройките на браузъра си.
message_firefox_sync_not_available.description: Error message when Firefox Sync is not available

message_failed_to_enable_sync.message: Неуспешно активиране на синхронизацията. Моля, проверете настройките на Firefox Sync.
message_failed_to_enable_sync.description: Error message when enabling sync fails

message_failed_to_disable_sync.description: Error message when disabling sync fails

message_sync_currently_disabled.description: Error message when sync is currently disabled

message_full_sync_initiated.message: Стартира се пълна синхронизация... Това може да отнеме малко време.
message_full_sync_initiated.description: Message when full sync is initiated
